name: Shepherd Drake
description: The Shepherd Drake is a medium-sized dragon known for its role in assisting and protecting vulnerable creatures, featuring high agility and durability.
memorable: It has abilities to charm animals and protect them in combat, making it a unique guardian of beasts.
goals: To safeguard and assist other creatures, especially vulnerable ones, in their environment.
relations: Often found in the company of various beasts, acting as their protector.
environment: Typically encountered in areas where it can oversee and protect wildlife.
strengths: Possesses high mobility with flying capabilities and notable defensive traits including resistance to being charmed or frightened.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to high-damage spells and powerful creatures, focused more on support than direct combat.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with a ram strike and two claw strikes, dealing significant bludgeoning and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to charm and direct animals, emphasizing its role as a protector.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 15, allowing it to effectively sense its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception with a modifier of +5.
additional_information: Immunity to charmed and frightened conditions.
Can communicate with beasts using the Speak with Beasts ability.
Has a Charge ability that can knock targets prone.
Breath weapon that induces indifference in hostile creatures or deals thunder damage.
Reaction ability to enhance allies' AC against attacks.
